Uses of Interface
com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.MutableContainer

  • Packages that use MutableContainer 
    Package Description
    com.github.bordertech.wcomponents
    Contains the core components of the WComponent framework.
    com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.monitor
    Contains the classes used for providing statics about the user context.

    • Uses of MutableContainer in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

      Classes in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents that implement MutableContainer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractMutableContainer
      This abstract class extends AbstractContainer and implements the MutableContainer interface to expose methods for modifying the contents of a container.
      class  AbstractTransientDataContainer
      AbstractTransientContextContainer ensures that all child components have transient state - ie will have their UI contexts reset after each request.
      class  DefaultTransientDataContainer
      A default implementation of AbstractTransientDataContainer that doesn't provide any data.
      class  WAjaxPollingRegion
      Deprecated. 
      1.2.0 This component is too abstract which leads to severe accessibility issues under common conditions and should have been an implementation example. See https://github.com/BorderTech/wcomponents/wiki/WAjaxPollingRegion.
      class  WApplication
      This component must be used as the top level component for an application.
      class  WBeanContainer
      Deprecated. 
      Use WContainer instead.
      class  WCardManager
      A WCardManager is a wcomponent used to control the visibility of its child components.
      class  WColumn
      This is a layout component to be used in conjunction with WRow.
      class  WContainer
      A default implementation of the Container interface.
      class  WDataRenderer
      This class is a convenience WComponent that is bound to a data object.
      class  WDataTableRowRenderer
      Deprecated. 
      Use WTable and WTableRowRenderer instead.
      class  WDecoratedLabel
      WDecorated is a "decorated label" which is typically displayed inside other components, for example WTab.
      class  WFieldSet
      WFieldSet is used to logically group together input fields.
      class  WInvisibleContainer
      This container is used as a marker for some special cases, where we want to skip normal WComponent life-cycle processes.
      class  WLabel
      The WLabel component is used to display a textual label for an input field.
      class  WMessages
      WMessages provides a convenient wrapper for the WMessageBox and WValidationErrors components, and lets the developer use a "singleton" WMessages instance per application.
      class  WNamingContext
      A container that provides a NamingContextable for its children's ids.
      class  WPanel
      A WPanel is used to group components together.
      class  WTableRowRenderer
      WTableRowRenderer is used by the table's repeater to render row data.

    • Uses of MutableContainer in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.monitor

      Classes in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.monitor that implement MutableContainer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ProfileContainer
      An extension of WContainer that renders some statistics after its normal output.
